nodes.text: Lieutenant Ligg Panat was a female Krish serving in Rogue Squadron at the start of the Yuuzhan Vong War in 25 ABY. She had the callsign Rogue Seven, and she approached combat as though it was a game, reflecting her species' enthusiasm for sport and play.
She was one of the pilots shot down at the Battle of Dantooine while protecting refugees escaping from Dubrillion.
